name: check_1583_status
description: Look up a customer's 1583 approval status in Freshsales CRM using their phone number. First tries the caller's phone number automatically, then asks for a phone number if needed.

function.name: check_1583_status
function.description: Check the customer's USPS 1583 form approval status by looking up their account using their phone number. The tool automatically tries the caller's phone number first. If that doesn't find a match, it will indicate that a phone number is needed.

phone_number.description: The customer's phone number to look up. Can be in any format: +19092601366, 19092601366, 9092601366, (909) 260-1366, etc. If not provided, the system will automatically try to use the caller's phone number.

messages.content: One moment please while I check your 1583 approval status.
I'm sorry, I'm having trouble looking up your account right now. Let me transfer you to a team member who can help.
